title: D-8218
author: D-8218
content: In terms of most memorable, it's going to have to be the collapse of FTX.Sam Bankman Fried cost everyone so much of their funds for no reason. Â Fuck that dude , may he rot.https://imgbb.com/gPp2dZ8What are some other examples in history that caused bitcoin to suffer because of greed?According to Wikipedia: the standard list is pride, greed, wrath, envy, lust, gluttony and sloth, which are contrary to the seven heavenly virtues.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seven_deadly_sins for further context.https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Seven_virtues <--- sam needs to read that one.
